sense.gloss: leap up from the initial charge in order to surprise the opponent

sdata.j: これらの↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が３↑艘↑↓そう↓の↑船↑↓ふね↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑国↑↓くに↓へやってきました。
sdata.e: These men had come to his country in three ships.

sdata.j: ↑湖↑↓みずうみ↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓に↑幾↑↓いく↓↑艘↑↓そう↓かのボートがあった。
sdata.e: There were some boats on the lake.

sdata.j: ↑数↑↓すう↓↑艘↑↓そう↓のヨットが、はるか↑沖合↑↓おきあい↓を↑並↑↓なら↓んで↑航行↑↓こうこう↓していた。
sdata.e: Several yachts were sailing side by side far out at sea.

sdata.j: むろん、↑舟↑↓ふね↓は↑何↑↓なに↓↑百↑↓ひゃく↓↑艘↑↓そう↓も↑水面↑↓すいめん↓を↑動↑↓うご↓きまわっているが、どれでもいいというわけにはいかない。
sdata.e: Of course there were several hundred boats moving around on the water but not just any old one would do.

words.gloss: leap up from the initial charge in order to surprise the opponent
